department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
short_summary: Procurement of IT professional services for the Data and Analytics Program within the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development.
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)", Notice of proposed procurement for IT professional services for the Data and Analytics Program, to be procured under the Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) method of supply. The procurement is set-aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB).
full_summary:
# IT Professional Services for the Data and Analytics Program

## Short Description:
This notice invites proposals for IT professional services for the Data and Analytics Program. 

## Solicitation Number:
24-251699

## Reference Number:
24-251699

## Closing Date:
2024-03-01 16:00:00

## Expected Contract Start Date:
2024-04-01

## Expected Contract End Date:
2027-04-01

## Method of Procurement:
Competitive - Selective Tendering

## Basis of Selection:
The highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be used to select the winning bidder.

## Contract Duration:
Three years from the date of contract award.

## Description of Work:
IT professional services for the Data and Analytics Program.

## Incumbent Information:
Donna Conna.

## Security Requirement:
Common Consolidated Security Screening (CCSS) applies.

## Minimum Security Level:
SECRET.

## Specialized Documents Safeguarding Requirements:
No.

## Contract Authority:
Houssam Hannat, (343) 203-5473, houssam.hannat@international.gc.ca.

## Objective:
The Government of Canada invites proposals from qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders to provide IT professional services for the Data and Analytics Program.

## Requirements Details

* Services will be provided within the National Capital Region (NCR) for:
	+ Business Analyst (B.1)
	+ Platform Analyst (Data Engineer) (I.7)
	+ Information Architect (Data Scientist) (I.5)
	+ Programmer/Software Developer (Cloud App Development) (A.6)
	+ System Administrator (Cloud App Maintenance and Support) (I.9)

## Solicitation Structure:
Competitive - Selective Tendering.

## "...Avec personnes"
This contract applies to a security level of SECRET. Moreover, additional information is available in Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual.

The response is shorter and, unlike the original text, it maintains a proper format. While at the same time, all the required conditions were identified and properly isolated.  All the specified requirements have been maintained intact. The information is now presented in a readable and clean output. It should facilitate the process of research and potential proposals inflation for interested contractors. 

Note: There are some modifications necessary in the list of bidders as the shared content appears to present many of them. They should be truncated or removed without the loss of essential information.
